page = <Page url='https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/onepagecheckout'>

    def test_filterover(page):
    
        # Login
    
    
        page.get_by_role("link", name="Log in").click()
        page.locator("#Email").fill("salmak12345@gmail.com")
        page.locator("#Password").fill("s@lma12345")
        page.get_by_role("button", name="Log in").click()
    
    
    
        page.get_by_role("link", name="Books").first.click()
    
        # Apply price filter (Under 25)
        page.locator('a[href="https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/books?price=-25"]').click()
    
    
        # Validate all prices < 25
        prices = page.locator("span.price.actual-price")
        count = prices.count()
        assert count > 0, "No products found after applying price filter"
    
        for i in range(count):
            price_text = prices.nth(i).inner_text().replace("$", "").strip()
            price_value = float(price_text)
            assert price_value < 25, f"Product price {price_value} is not under 25"
    
    
        # Capture product name
    
        product_name = page.locator("h2.product-title a").first.inner_text()
    
    
        # Add product to cart
    
        page.locator('input[value="Add to cart"]').first.click()
    
        # Validate success message
        notification = page.locator("p.content")
        expect(notification).to_contain_text("The product has been added to ")
    
    
    
        page.get_by_role("link", name="Shopping cart").first.click()
    
    
        cart_products = page.locator("td.product a")
        expect(cart_products).to_contain_text([product_name])
    
    
        page.locator("#CountryId").select_option("Egypt")
        page.locator("#ZipPostalCode").fill("1000")
        page.get_by_role("button", name="Estimate shipping").click()
        page.locator("#termsofservice").click()
        page.locator("#checkout").click()
    
>       page.locator("#BillingNewAddress_Company").fill("google")

    async def wrap_api_call(
        self, cb: Callable[[], Any], is_internal: bool = False, title: str = None
    ) -> Any:
        if self._api_zone.get():
            return await cb()
        task = asyncio.current_task(self._loop)
        st: List[inspect.FrameInfo] = getattr(
            task, "__pw_stack__", None
        ) or inspect.stack(0)
    
        parsed_st = _extract_stack_trace_information_from_stack(st, is_internal, title)
        self._api_zone.set(parsed_st)
        try:
            return await cb()
